May I quote a song "well here we are two thousand
years later and still the score is just the same.  You
can say that you don't believe it, but it doesn't
change a thing.  You can close your eyes, you can say
it's a lie, you can stick your head in the sand, you
can turn away, even try to explain, he was just
another man, but they nailed him to the cross by his
hands and his feet, and they put him in the ground.  3
days later everybody found out that you can't, no you
can't keep a good man down."
